data.title: Whalesync | Sync customer data across your GTM tools

Key Advantages

_Sync_¬†vs Automation
--------------------

Tools like Zapier give you "IFTTT" building blocks to build one-way automations. Whalesync enables deep, two-way sync in minutes.

[Whalesync vs Zapier](https://www.whalesync.com/versus/zapier)

### Sync ‚Äî Deep, bi-directional connection

With Whalesync, you can create deep integrations where all of your data across multiple apps is kept in sync. Simply map your data and we handle the logic to keep updates flowing.

### Automation ‚Äî One way, triggered actions

Automation tools like Zapier or Workato give you ‚Äúif-this-then-that‚Äù building blocks you can chain together to create logic. E.g. ‚Äúwhen a user submits a form, send a message to Slack‚Äù.

### Whalesync vs Zapier

Whalesync is built to handle mission-critical customer data integrations across your CRM, no-code tools, database, and GTM stack.
